Text: Why is there no XM? They didn't get suspended or anything did they?
I was listening on XM yesterday and I think they only did a half-day for some reason, as I tuned in at about 11am and it was Best Of repeats (the staple gun contest again.)
Anthony's girl was having semi-serious surgery - as it has been since the beginning, if one's gone than there's no show and that's that.
